Dear All,

 

I hope this email finds you well and all is ready to take on the exciting challenge ahead in the upcoming corporate games!

 

I am thrilled to share the schedule for the games:

 

*	Chess
*	Backgammon
*	Fifa PlayStation
*	Table Football

 

Now it is time to bring your A-game, and your teams are more than ready to step up. 

 

Let’s make this an unforgettable experience and proudly represent our group!

 

Regards,

RODY ROUFAYEL​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ HR OPERATIONS

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
